                    Our brilliant research scholars with excellent academic record and from different parts of the country are engaged in diverse and fascinating research areas such as IT & Society, speech recognition, medical imaging, music information retrieval or raga identification, energy efficiency in smart buildings, machine learning & AI, and health and wellness.
